## Request 6 -- "Down weight the age-composition sample sizes"

A lambda value of 0.05 was multiplied by the age-composition likelihood
component to calculate the overall negative log likelihood to be minimized.

* DM fishery: x (base), y (lambda)
* DM survey: x, y
* DM ratio: x, y
* Extra SD survey: x, y
* Extra SD age-1 index: x, y
* Age Likelihood: x, y
* Approximate run time: 2 hours, 14 hours

```{r plot-sur-fit-base-v-lambda-ssb, eval = FALSE}
m_names <- c("base", "lambda 0.05")
lambda_model <- readRDS(
  fs::path(
    models_dir, "05-test-models",
    "30-lambda-comps", "30-lambda-comps.rds"
  )
)
plot_survey_index_fits(list(base_model, lambda_model),
                         model_names = m_names,
                         survey_type = "age2",
                         rev_colors = TRUE,
                         leg_pos = "none",
                         xlim = c(1995, end_yr))
```
```{r plot-age1-fit-base-v-lambda-ssb, eval = FALSE}
plot_survey_index_fits(list(base_model, lambda_model),
                         model_names = m_names,
                         survey_type = "age1",
                         xlim = c(1995, end_yr),
                         ylim = c(0, 11),
                         leg_ncol = 2,
                         leg_font_size = 5,
                         leg_pos = c(0.45, 0.9),
                         y_breaks = seq(0, 11, by = 2),
                         rev_colors = TRUE)
```

```{r plot-base-v-lambda-ssb, eval = FALSE}
plot_biomass(list(base_model, lambda_model), model_names = m_names)
```

```{r plot-rel-base-v-lambda-ssb, eval = FALSE}
plot_rel_biomass(list(base_model, lambda_model),
                 model_names = m_names,
                 ylim = c(0, 2.5),
                 alpha = 0.2,
                 leg_pos = "none") |>
  suppressWarnings()
```

```{r plot-rec-base-v-lambda-ssb, eval = FALSE}

```
